thread.title: BRIEF-Unit of Qingdao Doublestar's Controlling Shareholder Invests $598.3 Mln In S.Korea's Kumho Tire

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unit of Qingdao Doublestar's Controlling Shareholder Invests $598.3 Mln In S.Korea's Kumho Tire
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Qingdao Doublestar Co Ltd:
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDERâ€™S UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO INVEST 646.3 BILLION WON ($598.26 million) IN KUMHO TIRE FOR 129.3 MILLION SHARES
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER'S UNIT WILL OWN 45 PERCENT STAKE IN KUMHO TIRE AFTER TRANSACTION, BECOMES KUMHO'S CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2I3X7tp Further company coverage: ($1 = 1,080.3000 won) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
